titles.title: To direct the Director of the Federal Emergency Management Agency to waive repayment requirements in connection with a grant made to Granada Hills Community Hospital in Granada Hills, California.

bill.summary: 10/11/2001--Introduced. Directs the Director of the Federal Emergency Management Agency (FEMA) to waive repayment requirements in connection with a grant made to Granada Hills Community Hospital in Granada Hills, California, under the seismic hazards mitigation program for hospitals administered by FEMA.
